column4: Please, i need help, my Applications--->Ubuntu Software Centre  menu is not loading at all !
Please, i need help, my Applications--->Ubuntu Software Centre  menu is not loading at all !
Please, i need help, my Applications--->Ubuntu Software Centre  menu is not loading at all !
Open a command prompt and type, "sudo apt-get update" and when that finishes then type, "sudo apt-get upgrade" and let it update the packages.
